ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Madhu Tirumandyam has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 8 years. Currently she is employed as an ETL and Teradata Developer at PayPal. Madhu has extensive knowledge of Teradata, UNIX, Informatica Analytics Package > Informatica PowerCenter, ETL, Oracle, Linux, PeopleSoft, Oracle 9i, Oracle 11g, Microsoft SQL Server 2000, Logic Works ERwin/ERX, Informatica, Cognos Impromptu, Business Objects, shell scripting, XML, Oracle PL/SQL, Microsoft SQL Server, ER Viewer, EDW, XML Schema, Scrum Methodology, Regression Testing, Oracle 10G, FTP, DB2, Control-M. So far Madhu has not gained any managerial experience.
